document_data.name: Arc of Lightning
document_data.mainbody: '''''Animalistic power''''' was an [[arcane]] and [[divine]] [[conjuration]] [[spell]] from the fourth and fifth circles of magic that dealt electricity damage to two objects within range. The spell could be used by: [[druid]]s, [[sorcerer]]s, [[wizard]]s, [[warmage]]s, and [[wu jen]].
document_data.Effects: The spell could be cast on two creatures within {{SI|25|ft|m|long=yes}} from the caster, and the spell's distance increased with the caster's magical proficiency. When the spell was discharged, it instantaneously connected two creatures with a bolt of electricity, affecting their natural conductivity. The power of the blast of electricity grew with the caster's magical skills.
document_data.Components: The spell required a [[Verbal component|verbal]], [[Somatic component|somatic]], and [[material component]]s. Its material components were two small rods of [[iron]].
